description: Test file for the App component of the Ocean Gallery Viewer project. Contains component rendering tests for the header and search functionality.

methods.name: test (renders Ocean Gallery header)
methods.description: Verifies that the header with 'Ocean Gallery' text is present in the DOM after rendering the App component.

methods.name: test (search input exists and filters empty state)
methods.description: Checks that the search input exists and that entering a non-matching query results in the 'No images match' message.
